message: Shit, I have to become a relationship counsellor as the only advice ever given is 'talk to each other'. As for the people who have posted spiteful comments about homosexuality or AIDS on here. No one forced you to read the article (although in many cases I suspect you didn't but decided to spout your vile, ill-informed, bigotted hatred anyway).
Please learn the difference between democratic socialism and communism. Two very different things!

Why doesn't President Trump do an EO making it illegal for illegal aliens to collect any type benefit. Right now their anchor baby allows them to collect entitlements. It should be that at least one parent must be a citizen or legal resident before entitlements are permitted. ALSO, how about requiring public schools to ask for proof of legal residency in this country before admitting a student.

I believe that this """"problem"""" started in the year 1592. But leaving ancient history aside, illegal immigration and the lack of government solutions for it is not something that Obama and Hillary created (don't understand why you would even include Hillary given she has never been president, yet) this goes back decades and involves Republican as well as Democrat administrations.
you cant change history. It is JUST a flag. Slavery started with a BLACK man selling them not white. But the black children are being taught to hate a flag, what do the adults expect.
, be careful what you wish for, it's going to be a bumpy road for the United States and the entire World for the next 4 years. If that's not a sobering thought then I don't know what is.
I thought California was not participating in immigration raids? I thought Arizona was having the issues as other states? What happend?
Never, It was a filthy Hillary setup.
She needs to shut up all ready about this. Her CORE will not heal cause she won't drop it.
does anyone meet up near Tamaqua PA? can't find anyone inside an hour away
Over my cold dead finger... We have the right to protect ourselves and our families.
Tell me one country where the WEST has as they call it wanted to help? What are the conditions of these countries?
Trump is welcomed because he's an idiot and clueless. All they have to do is compliment him and flatter him and they'll get their way. I'm sure they're praying for him to become president.
Who wrote this article? They seem as out of touch as McDonalds!

Bill Clinton cheats on his wife. Impeach him. Trump proudly brags about sexual assault (and has cheated on his wives). Elect him. Hillary oversaw the department of state while 4 people died in an embassy attack. Put her in jail. 2 Republicans were in office while over 200 people died in embassy attacks. No problem. Immigrants don't pay taxes. Round them up and kick them out. Trump doesn't pay taxes. He's a business genius. Hillary's foundation only spent 87% of their donations helping people. She's a crook. Trumps foundation paid off his debts, bought sculptures of him, and made political donations to avoid investigations while using less than 5% of funds for charity (and he got shut down by NY State). So savvy... Put him in the white house. Trump made 4 billion dollars in 40 years, when an index fund started at the same time with the same """"small loans"""" he received would be worth $12 billion today... without a trail of bankruptcies, thousands of lawsuits and burned small business owners. He's a real business whiz. Hillary took a loss of $700k. She's a criminal. Trump is the first candidate in the modern era not to release his tax returns, and took a billion dollar loss in 1 year. Genius. Hillary takes responsibility for private email servers and apologizes. Not credible. Trump denies saying things (on the record) he actually said (on the record), he's just telling it like it is. Your arguments are thin. Your ignorance of reality is shocking. Your double-standards are offensive, and your willingness to blindly support him and recycle the rhetoric is absurd. Your opinion is not fact. Your memes are not news articles. And your hypocrisy is not a platform. #trumpisapieceofshit
